title: Winter Warmth for Dhaka Slums
description: Providing warm clothing to families living in Dhaka's slum areas during harsh winter months.

title: Chittagong Hill Tracts Relief
description: Supporting indigenous communities in Chittagong Hill Tracts with winter essentials.

title: Sylhet Tea Garden Workers
description: Helping tea garden workers and their families stay warm during winter season.

title: Rangpur Rural Communities
description: Distributing blankets and warm clothes to rural communities in Rangpur division.

title: Rajshahi Elderly Care
description: Special winter care program for elderly citizens in Rajshahi division.

title: Khulna Coastal Protection
description: Protecting coastal communities in Khulna from cold weather conditions.
